Description: The Department of Justice, the United States Environmental Protection Agency, and the West Virginia Department of Environmental Protection announced a settlement with Antero Resources Corporation resolving alleged violations of Section 404 of the Clean Water Act at 32 sites in Harrison, Doddridge, and Tyler Counties in West Virginia.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department

Notes: Amended Order, penalty had already been paid.

Agency: West Virginia Department of Environmental Protection
